p: Environmental pollution is a major problem facing all countries around the world. Rapid growth on the industrial and urban side has concluded in vast quantities of potentially harmful waste products being related to the environment. The massive increase in the number of inhabitants and vehicles has led to major concern about " Noise Pollution" where it has become a major problem facing societies [ 1]. Noise pollution is impacting on the communities’ developments as it has a direct and indirect effect on human activities like education, production, economic processes and social aspects. Noise effects have different impacts on human’s mental and physical health and disturbance of daily activities and that effects can cause temporary or permanent hearing loss, ranging from slight impairment to nearly total deafness [ 2].
